title: 怎么让死亡不掉落
txt_content: 每次死亡不掉落真的烦

replies.txt_content: 你是单机加死亡不掉落mod 应该可以了{:10_521:}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
按t输入指令：

/gamerule keepInventory true复制代码

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2016-2-5 18:44
/gamerule keepkeepInventory true
糟了打错了，是gamerule keepInventory true复制代码

replies.author: Bobz
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 勿忘晴天
replies.txt_content: 取消死亡不掉落/gamerule keepInventory false

replies.author: cloud_dream
replies.txt_content: 输入指令/gamerule keepInventory true  或者加入死亡不掉落mod，论坛内地址:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
